section.title: Installation Complete! Next Steps
section.para: Congratulations! You have now installed &PRODUCT; Management Server and the database it uses to persist system data.

textobject.phrase: installation-complete.png: Finished installs with single Management Server and multiple Management Servers

listitem.para: Even without adding any cloud infrastructure, you can run the UI to get a feel for what's offered and how you will interact with &PRODUCT; on an ongoing basis. See Log In to the UI.
When you're ready, add the cloud infrastructure and try running some virtual machines on it, so you can watch how &PRODUCT; manages the infrastructure. See Provision Your Cloud Infrastructure.
